attributes.action: Request to remove The Balearic & Canary islands from UK return 14 day quarantine
attributes.additional_details: I understand that from certain areas of Spain there maybe a need for this. But from Tenerife for example it’s probably actually much safer there at present than in the U.K.  We were told it was ok to book holidays. Some people may have to cancel but their flights may still go which means people are out of pocket once again.
attributes.background: I would like the government to remove the need for quarantine coming back from the Balearic and Canary’s islands
